channel.title: Project Rune-Clerisy (clean slate)
channel.description:
[center][url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,315811.msg2652904.html#msg2652904][size=15pt][b]Please Click This for information on Clerisy[/b][/size][/url][/center] [b]Done[/b]
- Welcome screen fully compatible with game progress - Full rep system - right click char for kick/ban choice menu. - Full tutor dialog. - Welcome screen displays rep, rank (rep rank), to do list, rights (player, mod, admin) - All teleports are used with spells, or portals, not emotes. - Highscores for rep rank, pkpoints (killcount pkpoints, and deathcount total), and total level. - Lobbies, for staff meeting, server meeting, or election. - Wild is fixed, so that everything except for the wilderness is non-wild. - Office lobby lock system. - Full Rep & Rank System. [b]- Random Walk fixed. (creds to The Soul)[i](new)[/i][/b] [b]- Staff Tools Finished[i](new)[/i][/b] [b]- Full Election System. Able to Toggle.[i](new)[/i][/b] [b]- Portals to locations[i](new[/i][/b] [b]- Shows "Mod, Admin, etc." next to players name in playerMenu[i](new)[/i][/b]
[b]Want to do & know how to do[/b]
[s]- players/mods/admins online. display mod and admin next to name if mod or admin.[/s] - stat help, click the stat and display a menu for it. - quests in general. [b]- Common room accessories.[i]close to finished[/i][/b] - Barrows fix. [s]- commands list (in quest list)[/s] [s]- command to quest list switch system.[/s] [b]- pking spots (ancient teles)[i]close to finished[/i][/b] - fix exp rate, skills and combat. (slower) [s]- view staff list[/s]
[b]What to do & not sure how I'm going to do it[/b]
[b]- Full Jailing System. [i](new)[/i][/b] [b]- Tele All Staff [i](new)[/i][/b] [s]- election system[/s] - item on npc. [s]- random walk for npc, mines effed up.[/s] - followhandler, without walking through walls. - "Type in the username you want to kick/ban". (brings up "enter username" interface like add friend.) - reports viewable to mods ingame. - get report to work, also effed up. [b][s]- wild warning so that it just displays when going into it instead of both in and out.[/s](exempt, pointless.)[/b] - projectiles
I'm pretty sure i covered most of the stuff that has been on my mind. I'll come back and post whatever else i think of. I'll report back here if I get any more updates on the project. [center][size=14pt][b]Here's the Pictures.[/b][/size][/center] Tools [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/dlhv2a.jpg[/img] Locking the door/Opening it. [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/a2dxg5.jpg[/img] Setting up polls, and voting [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/sbuhyt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/faqs6.jpg[/img] Polls are turned off [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/et8ch5.jpg[/img] Misc. Pictures of Bank at lobby and Barmaid Npc. [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/34ssca9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/10z8dgi.jpg[/img]

item.title: Project Rune-Clerisy (clean slate)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

I’m sorry to say that everyone looking forward to this may be disappointed. My computer went under some reconstruction, and i requested that my whole drive be wiped clean so that it has a clean slate to perform on. After doing this, everything I made pertaining to private servers and anything relative to Clerisy is now gone. I will have to start completely over, but I’m willing to make it up to you guys.

After having this happen, i left mopar for a while to spend some time elsewhere, doing other things. I have to admit, i missed my old friends over here, and missed seeing the outcome of my productions and sources. I’m looking forward to starting back up on rune Clerisy, and i have a few new ideas to add to it. I’ll be updating this thread again as time goes on. Although there is no promise for a definite release date, I can tell you that it shouldn’t be too long of a project. I miss being the spotlight in mscp like i was back when i released reapagescape. The project shouldn’t take longer than a month.

<3 The Reaper X

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rune-Clerisy (clean slate)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

As you know, I haven’t been as active as I used to be on mopar. It’s because I’ve been trying to recover from some BS my java was giving me, and I’ve been exploring some new communities, including my G-Mod community RSPSR (stormcutter’s). Most of my development will be now discussed over there.

Since we’re looking for more members, we’ve decided to make a webclient + community server over there. All of my development will be collaborated into that server, along with Mikeyofadown, stormcutter, The Soul, Project Evolution, si force, ziplock and warner’s ideas and development. We’re making it a team project, so I’m definitely not releasing Project Rune-Clerisy. It’s being slowly evolved into what we’re calling RSPS Reloaded. I’ll still report back on some of my portion of Reloaded.

Read full topic
